page.title: 08Government
page.content: {Government { }Flockton is part of Kirkburton Parish Council, which is within the Metropolitan district council of Kirklees. { }The villages of Overton, Middlestown, Netherton and Midgley form the parish of Sitlington which is part of the Wakefield Metropolitan district. Sitlington has its own parish council formed of six councillors from the Middlestown / Overton area and five from the Netherton / Midgley part of the parish. Meetings are monthly, alternating between Netherton and Middlestown. Until changed in 1929 the original name of the parish was Shitlington. Its parish council has been in existence since 1895.
